title: ↔Swaps
desc: How do you swap sats from on-chain to Lightning and visa versa?

msgs.text: How do you swap sats from on-chain to Lightning and visa versa?

If it's on your node, you can use the swap or loop out feature in Thunderhub. Otherwise, you could also use these online wallets to do it. CoinOS.io or boltz.exchange. 
Finally, @MuunWallet accomplishes what you're trying to do with submarine swaps
